data.lyric:
[ti:XXL]
[ar:DaBaby]
[al:KIRK (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]XXL (Explicit) - DaBaby
[00:01.62]I got 20 on my b***h
[00:03.46]Everybody know my name
[00:04.39]Ringin' bells ringin' bells like the hallway
[00:06.33]I ain't gotta cap in no motherf**king rap
[00:08.00]I whip out and air it out broad day
[00:09.54]I got in with the stick and I'm with that
[00:11.12]Break a n***a in half like a Kit-Kat
[00:12.96]I been tryna' be positive mama
[00:14.59]They ain't f**kin' wit' Jonathan mama
[00:15.91]Who you know put they motherf**kin' self on the map
[00:17.83]And now they ain't on nobody s**t
[00:19.56]I send one of my lil' n***as come take you off
[00:21.20]You get laid on the floor by a jit
[00:22.86]Got pulled over with 55K in my pocket
[00:24.82]The police they know I'm legit
[00:26.49]The police they know I got sticks
[00:27.66]They be worried about me they know I'ma click
[00:29.74]These n***as they know I'm a dawg I ain't worried about him
[00:31.79]I know he a b***h
[00:32.95]The next n***a that come play with me
[00:34.19]I'ma send him to go ask 2Pac for a pic
[00:36.41]They say I'm the hottest new n***a
[00:37.51]Go check the thermometer that n***a sick
[00:39.66]N***a must have a fever or somethin'
[00:40.97]Heard he was born up on Cleveland or somethin'
[00:42.88]Let me give you a history lesson
[00:44.22]We moved back to Charlotte 1999
[00:45.96]Ok
[00:46.26]I ain't sayin' that none of that matter
[00:47.58]If somebody touch me then somebody die
[00:49.22]No cap
[00:49.66]Why he talkin' so calm when he say that
[00:51.12]How you make him rewind and replay that
[00:52.92]Who you know get a fade once a week
[00:54.23]And they try make it wave f**k a motherf**kin' wave-cap
[00:56.36]Everytime that the DJ play Suge
[00:57.66]N***as throw up they arm like a motherf**kin' racetrack
[00:59.64]Everytime that my babygirl see me she run
[01:01.25]And say Daddy I love when she say that
[01:03.02]Everytime I hit one of my moves all the b***hes go crazy
[01:04.98]They like how I do that
[01:06.27]I keep one in the head if I don't let off first
[01:08.01]I'ma dive to the side when I shoot back
[01:09.67]Yeah I'm comin' like Blade in this b***h
[01:11.25]F**k around and walked down in a trenchcoat
[01:12.95]They gon' have to put me with the greats
[01:14.61]Wanna f**k with me she gotta wait b***h
[01:16.36]Only yacht would mean me and the kids
[01:17.58]There's four of us we're on the sea eatin' steak
[01:19.42]I won't go back and forth with a shrimp
[01:21.15]You goin' out sad 'bout no h*e I'm a pimp
[01:22.90]He keep bumpin' his motherf**kin' gun
[01:24.22]We gon put his a*s up like a motherf**kin' blimp
[01:26.01]B***h
[01:26.40]Like to talk on the pillow wit' h*es that's gon' get him
[01:28.28]Exposed he a muhf**king simp
[01:29.59]You know he keep that thang on him baby
[01:30.99]Quit askin' him why that boy walk with a limp
[01:32.36]Shh shh shh
[01:33.03]I 'on't care bout this motherf**kin' chain
[01:34.58]But I still bust your motherf**kin' brain
[01:36.26]Just got head on a motherf**king plane
[01:37.92]Ain't no cap in my rap I'm the truth
[01:39.61]And then f**kin' yo ho from the back
[01:40.78]I knew ho for a day she won't ghost she the swoup
[01:42.99]And these n***as ain't living like this
[01:44.20]Why he talkin' so gangsta
[01:44.96]Your boy he a fluke
[01:46.23]They know Baby gon' blow he a flute
[01:47.94]They know Baby gon' blow he the bomb
[01:49.43]They know Baby was just in Miami
[01:50.94]Now he in LA n***a think he LeBron
[01:52.84]They know Baby go baby on baby
[01:54.27]But five years ago n***as say he was John
[01:55.78]I touch down at the front of the plane
[01:57.50]And the driver come pick up my Louis Vuitton
[01:59.62]While he drive me around I be blowin' that pressure
[02:01.34]I'm chillin' backseat with the iron
[02:03.24]B***h
[02:04.62]I'm done
data.trans:
[ti:XXL]
[ar:DaBaby]
[al:KIRK (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.62]Producer 20制作
[00:03.46]每个人都知道我的名字
[00:04.39]就像大厅里的钟声一样响亮
[00:06.33]我不需要在说唱里面吹牛
[00:08.00]我会在光天化日之下将我的成功广而告之
[00:09.54]我随时随地带着武器
[00:11.12]惹我的家伙都会被一分为二 就像Kit-Kat巧克力棒一样
[00:12.96]我一直想要做个积极向上的人
[00:14.59]他们都不敢和我胡闹
[00:15.91]你知道吗 有些人曾经自以为是
[00:17.83]现在他们已经销声匿迹
[00:19.56]我派出一个兄弟伙去把你除掉
[00:21.20]你会被一个小屁孩撂倒在地
[00:22.86]我口袋里装了好多那种东西 车被拦下来
[00:24.82]警察知道我没犯法
[00:26.49]警察知道我有枪
[00:27.66]他们都害怕我 他们知道我有很多兄弟
[00:29.74]这些家伙都知道我不是一般人 我不担心他
[00:31.79]我知道他是个碧池
[00:32.95]再有人来招惹我
[00:34.19]我就送他去和2Pac合影
[00:36.41]他们说我是最火的新人
[00:37.51]去看看他的热度 他简直火爆了
[00:39.66]仿佛他发高烧了
[00:40.97]听说他出生在克利夫兰
[00:42.88]让我给你上一节历史课
[00:44.22]我们在九九年搬回了夏洛特
[00:45.96]//
[00:46.26]我不是说那些事情不重要
[00:47.58]如果有人惹我 那他就会没命的
[00:49.22]没有吹牛
[00:49.66]为什么他说那种话的时候那么冷静
[00:51.12]你怎么能逆转时光 从头再来
[00:52.92]有谁像我这样 每周都有新花样
[00:54.23]他们都想跟上潮流 这些都不是跟你吹牛的
[00:56.36]每当DJ播放《Suge》时
[00:57.66]大家都会不由自主地举起双臂 好像在赛车道上一样
[00:59.64]每当我的宝贝姑娘看到我时 都会奔过来
[01:01.25]大声地叫我爹地 我喜欢听她这样叫我
[01:03.02]每当我跳起舞蹈 那些女人都会像疯了一样
[01:04.98]她们喜欢我的舞姿
[01:06.27]如果不是我首先开火 那我会保留一张王牌
[01:08.01]当我反击之后 我会闪到一边
[01:09.67]我就像刀锋战士一样炸裂出场
[01:11.25]把这里搞得鸡飞狗跳之后潇洒离去
[01:12.95]将来他们会把我当做伟人
[01:14.61]想和我在一起 她必须耐心等待
[01:16.36]游艇上 我和兄弟们一起狂欢
[01:17.58]我们四个人在海上吃牛排
[01:19.42]我不会和小鱼小虾拉拉扯扯
[01:21.15]你为了女人愁眉苦脸 我的身边美女成群
[01:22.90]他总是玩弄他那破手枪
[01:24.22]我们会把他送上天 就像软式飞艇
[01:26.01]//
[01:26.40]喜欢在床上和女人聊天 这样更容易知道那些家伙的小秘密
[01:28.28]他们都是蠢货
[01:29.59]你知道 他总是把家伙带在身上
[01:30.99]别再问他为什么那个家伙走路一瘸一拐的
[01:32.36]闭嘴
[01:33.03]我不在乎什么金链子
[01:34.58]但我还是会摘掉你的脑袋
[01:36.26]我刚在飞机上被姑娘伺候了一回
[01:37.92]在我的歌里 从来不会吹牛 都是事实
[01:39.61]最后再抢了你的女人
[01:40.78]我认识这娘们才一天 她不肯走 她粘着我
[01:42.99]这些家伙没有这样的生活
[01:44.20]为什么他的语气那么强硬
[01:44.96]你的兄弟都是靠运气
[01:46.23]他们知道 我DaBaby肯定会火
[01:47.94]他们知道 我DaBaby肯定会成功
[01:49.43]他们知道 我DaBaby前几天还在迈阿密
[01:50.94]现在就到了洛杉矶 他们以为我是LeBron James
[01:52.84]他们知道 我DaBaby就是这么优秀
[01:54.27]但五年前 很多人都说我不会有什么成就
[01:55.78]如今我一跃成名 他们都错了
[01:57.50]专职司机来帮我把刚买的LV带回去
[01:59.62]他开着车 我就在后座上来支烟 释放压力
[02:01.34]我坐在后座上 身上别着枪
[02:03.24]//
[02:04.62]我受够了
